Posts.Content: Great news congrats to you and your family.....
Posts.Title: Sharing Good News - New Great Grandson (Non-breast cancer related)

Posts.Content: I just cut it shorter and shorter until i finally did a buzzz and it was much better ,don't worry you can do it.....
Posts.Title: need advice on hair loss preparation

Posts.Content: My first cancer 1994 Stage 2 ductal carcinoma ,level 1 , 3 positive lymph nodes. to tell you the truth I was 31 don't really remember and after the 5 year tamoxifen treatment never really thought about it. Sometimes I actually forgot I even went through this not something I talked about to much until this July when i went for my 17 year check up....and boom back to reality...just had my 3rd treatment today and went for a wig...but my hair so far doesn't seem to be falling out but I know it will very soon....I hope I answered your questions and I'm always here to answer any more that you want take care... Dee
Posts.Title: Dee1962 I have a Question for you

Posts.Content: THAT IS WONDERFUL NEWS.......AND GO PARTY PARTY....
Posts.Title: Finished Chemo!

Posts.Content: Here's the deal I had bc 17 yrs ago, and now got it back 2 months ago. The problem is it came back stage iv...So i'm doing chemo which made me lose my hair, eyebrows and lashes. Chemo has been working things are getting better but my problem is i want the Dr. to change my chemo when it's time for just a maintenance cause i want to try and live a normal life with HAIR AND EYEBROWS.... I can't get over looking in the mirror every morning looking like a monster.....That's not the way i want to live the rest of my life... Can anyone out there agree with me? Dee
Posts.Title: my family doesn't understand

Posts.Content: We are al here for you Dawn any questions i'm sure we can answer them for you be strong...Dee xoxo
